lines.text: Well, we're all fools sometimes. Only you choose such awkward times.
You've got the mind of a pig.
Little friend of all the world, nobody's enemy but me own.
Yeah, I can tell that by the look of you.
I say! I know what it is that gives me a queer feeling when I look at you.
The little Pierrot boy! Were you a girl dressed as as a boy? Or are you a boy dressed as a girl?

[speaking to Sylvia dressed as a boy]
"I say, uh! I know what it is that gives me a queer feeling when I look at you. There's something in you to be painted."
